subject: Peer review of Utility Shifting Works/Estimates proposed by DPR Consultants:- Addendum to Policy Circular No 7.2.13/2021 ; Dated 30th March;2021 - reg.
text: MRdy 775ty RTHRf qifeart (aeq5 4Rdev # TTHPf HA1TY,  4RT TrTFT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Arn4 74 3ff-5 Qd 6, Par7-10, ERoT, #f ferf} 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 3HI/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Utility Shifting/2022 Policy Circular No. 7.2.14/2022 dated 17th June, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/SRDQ/206/2021 (Computer No: 95815)} Sub.: Peer review of Utility Shifting Works/Estimates proposed by DPR Consultants:- Addendum to Policy Circular No 7.2.13/2021 Dated 3Oth March,2021- reg: Vide policy circular dated 30.03.2021_ it has been mandated that the Utility Shifting estimates submitted by DPR consultants be reviewed by Utility Experts independently and the estimated cost vetted by such experts be incorporated in the appraisal/bid documents of HAMZEPC. 2 The   Annexure A of the said  Policy Circular notified a list 5 empanelled   retired government officials empanelled for Peer Review of Utility Shifting Estimates. 3_ In continuation, the updated list of retired government officials for Peer Review of Utility Shifting Works /Estimates proposed by DPR Consultants is as under:_ S Name of Retired Last position held Mobile Nos.
